translation.en: You know how I came up with the idea for the Triple- X program?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cómo se me ocurrió la idea del programa Triple-X?

translation.en: Skateboards and swimming pools.
Skateboards used to be stuck on the ground.
translation.es: Antes, las patinetas no volaban. Eran transporte de adolescentes.

translation.en: Adolescent transportation. Then 1977 happens.
translation.es: Antes, las patinetas no volaban. Eran transporte de adolescentes. Entonces llegó 1977.

translation.en: Big drought hits Southern California.
translation.es: Una sequía azotó el sur de California.

translation.en: Got so bad, rich suburbanites couldn't afford to fill their swimming pools.
translation.es: Fue tan grave que la gente rica no podía llenar sus piscinas.

translation.en: That's when the light clicked on.
translation.es: Entonces se prendió el foco. A un adolescente se le ocurrió...

translation.en: Some kid figured out he could skate those empty pools
translation.es: Entonces se prendió el foco. A un adolescente se le ocurrió... ...que podía patinar en esas piscinas vacías y salir volando.

translation.en: and get some real nasty air.

translation.en: Dogtown and Z- Boys. You ever seen it? It's a movie.
translation.es: Dogtown and Z-Boys. ¿La has visto? Es una película.

translation.en: No? Doesn't matter.
Anyhow, our hero starts doing things on a board
translation.es: No importa. Nuestro héroe empieza a hacer cosas con una patineta...

translation.en: that no one's ever seen before.
Things the world thought were impossible.
translation.es: Cosas que el mundo consideraba imposibles.

translation.en: Now, that kid needed that drought.
The world needed those empty pools.
translation.es: El mundo necesitaba esas piscinas vacías.

translation.en: That's why Triple- X.
Do you feel safer today than you felt yesterday? I know I don't.
translation.es: ¿Te sientes más seguro que ayer? Sé que yo no.

translation.en: The biggest, most expensive military in the world,
translation.es: La milicia más poderosa y costosa del mundo...

translation.en: and we're still scared of shoe and tighty- whitey bombs at the airport.
translation.es: ...y aún nos aterran las bombas en zapatos y ropa interior en el aeropuerto.

translation.en: Why is that?
Because soldiers are built to take orders and fight wars.
translation.es: Porque los soldados solo saben seguir órdenes y pelear en guerras.

translation.en: But we, my friend, are not at war.
translation.es: Pero nosotros, amigo, no estamos en guerra.

translation.en: We are at peril.
That's why Triple- X.
What's the matter? You on a diet? You ain't hungry?
It's seven- thirty in the morning.
So? It's lunch or dinnertime somewhere in the world.
translation.es: ¿Y? Es hora de almorzar o cenar en algún lado del mundo.

translation.en: Come on, eat up!
You know who does feel safe? The men in charge. The world beaters.
translation.es: ¿Sabes quién se siente a salvo? Los que mandan. Los poderosos.

translation.en: The top- shelf, par excellence ayatollahs with all the dollahs.
translation.es: Los ayatolas por excelencia con todos los dolas.

translation.en: And that's because those righteous bastards,
translation.es: Eso se debe a que esos santurrones en algún momento...

translation.en: somewhere along the way, made a deal with the devil.
translation.es: Eso se debe a que esos santurrones en algún momento... ...pactaron con el diablo. Cambiaron libertad por seguridad. Y nosotros...

translation.en: They traded liberty for safety.
translation.es: ...pactaron con el diablo. Cambiaron libertad por seguridad. Y nosotros...

translation.en: And us, we the people, ended up losing both.
translation.es: ...el pueblo... ...perdimos las dos cosas. Por eso existe Triple-X.

translation.en: That's why Triple- X.
translation.es: ...perdimos las dos cosas. Por eso existe Triple-X.

translation.en: While everybody else is stuck on the ground,
translation.es: Mientras todos los demás se quedan en el suelo...

translation.en: we're doing shit on the board, nobody's ever even seen before.
translation.es: ...nosotros hacemos cosas nunca vistas con la patineta.

translation.en: Well, that's my pitch.
I always was a better spy than a salesman.
translation.es: Siempre he sido mejor espía que vendedor.

translation.en: So, what do you say?
I'm no hero. I'm just a footballer.
translation.es: Yo no soy un héroe. Solo soy futbolista.

translation.en: My bad.
So, I'll leave you be, then.
Who said there's no such thing as a free meal?

translation.en: - Down on the ground, now! - Give me the money!
Don't move! Hurry up!
Goal!
And you say you're no hero.

translation.en: I got to call bullshit on that!
You're exactly the kind of hero the world needs.

translation.en: At the end of the day,
translation.es: A fin de cuentas, todo se reduce a la misma pregunta

translation.en: it comes down to the same question I've been asking my wife
translation.es: A fin de cuentas, todo se reduce a la misma pregunta que le hago a mi esposa todos los viernes desde hace 20 años:

translation.en: every Friday night for the last 20 years.
translation.es: que le hago a mi esposa todos los viernes desde hace 20 años:

translation.en: - Access granted. -
Okay, you may sit.
Gentlemen,
this is the device that crashed the satellite and killed Gibbons.
translation.es: ...este es el dispositivo que hizo caer el satélite y mató a Gibbons.

translation.en: Nerds in the lab have coined it Pandora's Box.
translation.es: Los nerds del laboratorio lo llaman la Caja de Pandora.

translation.en: My team backtracked the satellite's last signal input to Miami.

translation.en: Some asshole living the high life at the Ritz- Carlton penthouse
translation.es: Un idiota dándose la gran vida en el Ritz-Carlton

translation.es: pensó que podía chantajear el mundo.

translation.es: Tres granadas, dos balas y un cadáver más tarde... ...nos apoderamos del dispositivo.

translation.en: to prevent some punk with a laptop from hijacking satellites.
translation.es: para impedir que un imbécil con una computadora portátil secuestre satélites.

translation.en: And Pandora's Box can bypass all of them.

translation.es: Aprietas un botón, y puede espiar comunicaciones codificadas...

translation.es: ...corromper software militar, transmitir información falsa o...

translation.es: ...hacer que un satélite caiga del cielo como un misil táctico.

translation.en: You fight me with a book?
Here you go, brother. Chapter one! Page one!
Shit happens.
You're late!
- Just in time, boss. -
They bust in here, step on our throats,
and take the one device that can cause a global power shift.

translation.en: So how do we get it back?
These assholes just took out the best of the best like it was Sunday brunch.

translation.es: Necesitamos a alguien que pueda meterse en un tornado...

translation.en: and come out the other side like it was a damn gentle breeze.
translation.es: ...y salir del otro lado como si hubiera sido una brisa suave.

No.
But Gibbons did.
- What you doing? - That's loco, chico!
Xander!
- Xander! -
And here we go, we are underway!
Go, go, go.

translation.es: Claro que Xander Cage no puede pagarle a la compañía del satélite

What?
And line the pockets of some boardroom billionaires?

translation.en: You know,
these days, a regular guy can't afford to be regular.

translation.en: - - Let's go.
World getting smaller?
I know the feeling.
Running from your problems never works out.

- I need a new map. -
Don't say I didn't warn you.

Here we go again.
Down! Get down! Don't move, asshole!
On your knees now, you son of a bitch!
Okay, okay. I want to comply. I really wanna comply. But you're confusing me.

translation.en: Don't move, you asshole. On your knees, you son of a bitch. Which is it?

translation.en: - One! -
Two!
Okay!
Come on out, Frankenstein!
Gibbons!
- Gibbons? - Olly- olly- oxen- free.
Wow. You really do look different, Gibbons.

Augustus always had such, well,
not exactly nice things to say about you.

You had a guy over there wearing $1,000 Beats

Clarence from It's a Wonderful Life.
The nice old man that you had sit down next to me with the bag of bombs?

- The bullets could've been real. - Then the body armor would've been real.

I've never seen anything like it.
This group is lethal, and they don't care who or what gets in their way.

you get that I don't work for suits.

Well, welcome back, Triple- X.
Uh, where are you going?
- London. - Why? What's in London?

And possibly, my fur coat.

...not.

translation.es: PUESTO DE LA REAL FUERZA AÉREA LAKENHEATH, REINO UNIDO Después de acabar con Anarquía 99, Gibbons recibió un cheque en blanco.

and fuel tanks big enough

Kumquat.
